attributes.action: offer leave and pay to parents who have to leave work to look after a sick child
attributes.additional_details: implement serious children's illness pay and leave for parents who are forced to make the decision between looking after their child or going to work.
attributes.background: offer leave and pay to working parents who have to leave work to be by the bedside of their child in hospital.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Implement a ‘Statutory Dependents Pay’ for being off with your sick child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715000
